name: Good Girl Blush Elixir
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Rose, Vanilla, Patchouli.Fragrance Description:Good Girl Blush Elixir is a sensual, more intense interpretation of Good Girl Blush, housed in an alluring d√©grad√© bottle. This new addition to the Good Girl family reveals the multifaceted nature of modern femininity with a seductive blend of rose, vanilla, and patchouli..About the Fragrance:The newest addition to the Good Girl family, this exotic elixir reveals the multifaceted nature of modern femininity with a seductive blend of ravishing rose, voluminous vanilla, and smoky, scintillating patchouli.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Cinnamate, Alcohol, Citral, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Benzyl Alcohol, Ci 60730 (ext. Violet 2).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary bottle of the Carolina Herrera Good Girl Blush Elixer from Influenster and Carolina Herrera in exchange for my honest review.   Let's just begin by admiring how gorgeous the high heel shaped bottle is, perfect for any fragrance collection. The fragrance itself has amazing projection. I sprayed it at first into the box and placed it on the counter in my bathroom, and the room smelled like the perfume for 2 days. So, if you're sensitive to fragrances, this probably isn't the scent for you, but if you're looking for longevity, it's perfect. It can be a bit strong, but it's a beautiful, feminine floral scent. I'm usually more of a gourmand or fruity floral fan, but this is a lovely, warm floral scent. You can definitely still smell the vanilla as well as the rose and patchouli. It gives off a seductive, sexy vibe, something you would wear on a date yet still feminine and dainty enough to wear during the day. I highly recommend trying this perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Carolina Herrera Good Girl Blush Elixir offers a perfectly balanced scent strength. It is neither too overpowering nor too subtle, making it ideal for both day and night wear. The fragrance starts off with a burst of fresh and floral notes, which then mellow into a warm and comforting base. This elixir is incredibly versatile, suitable for any occasion. Whether you‚Äôre heading to a casual brunch, a day at the office, or an evening gala, Good Girl Blush Elixir complements every setting. Its balanced composition makes it a year-round fragrance, perfect for all seasons. The packaging of Carolina Herrera Good Girl Blush Elixir is as stunning as the fragrance itself. The iconic stiletto-shaped bottle is given a blush pink hue, adding a touch of femininity and elegance. It‚Äôs a beautiful addition to any vanity and truly embodies the essence of sophistication. The projection of this fragrance is moderate, allowing it to leave a pleasant trail without overwhelming those around you. It‚Äôs perfect for close encounters and daily wear, ensuring that you smell delightful throughout the day without being intrusive. Good Girl Blush Elixir boasts unique notes that set it apart from other fragrances. The blend of floral and fruity top notes transitions smoothly into a heart of delicate white flowers, grounded by a base of warm vanilla and tonka bean. This combination creates a multi-dimensional scent that is both intriguing and memorable. Carolina Herrera Good Girl Blush Elixir is a delightful fragrance that offers a harmonious blend of strength, versatility, and elegance. Its beautiful packaging and unique scent make it a must-have for any perfume collection.

reviews.review_title: Good girl blush is a new staple!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To give a brief summary: The Good Girl Blush Elixir embodies a burst of fresh florals, encapsulating femininity in a delicate pastel-pink stiletto bottle. This radiant reinterpretation of the classic Good Girl fragrance unveils the complex essence of contemporary womanhood, blending sensual Vanilla and exotic Ylang Ylang for a captivating aroma.   This perfume has become an absolute staple in my collection. I reach for it every single day. I get compliments when I wear it, and I feel so confident when I do. This fragrance is sexy, it perfectly embodies womanhood to me. It is floral, you get the notes of ylang ylang almost immediately. It isn‚Äôt spicy per se, however, I would say it does have warmness to it that lean towards spice. Everyone has different body chemistry and has different longevity when it comes to perfumes, for myself I can confidently say that I can smell this perfume on me for 6-8 hours. That said, it could last less than that on someone else. My advice is to spray around your neck, and if you apply vaseline first it will definitely stay a lot longer if that is a concern for you. This perfume is luxurious, so you will spend money on it. But the packaging, smell, and longevity truly make this a worthy investment in my opinion.

reviews.review_text: Discovering a fragrance that seamlessly blends fruity playfulness with sophisticated allure was a game-changer for me. It's as if the sweetness is balanced by a subtle complexity, hinting at the underlying sophistication.  What truly speaks volumes about this perfume is the number of compliments I receive whenever I wear it. Whether I'm catching up with friends over brunch or attending a formal event, people always inquire about the captivating scent lingering in the air. It's incredibly flattering and reaffirms my love for this fragrance.  Considering the number of compliments and inquiries I've received, repurchasing this perfume is a no-brainer. It has earned a permanent spot in my collection, and I can't imagine my spring and summer without it.

reviews.review_text: I received this perfume for free from Influenster to try in exchange for my honest review. The high heel bottle is beautiful! It will be a bottle that I will keep long after it is empty as decor. The perfume smells really nice. It starts as a floral and then turns into a sweet vanilla. It lasts the entire day and is strong so a little goes a long way. I like to describe it this way: one spray people will smell it when they hug you, two sprays and the person sitting next to you will be able to smell it, three sprays is probably too much. This is not one of those perfumes that you spray a bunch of times in the air and then walk through; that would be way too strong. I like to use it by doing one spray on my neck and then quickly tapping my wists on my neck before it dries. This is a sweet, young and elegant scent. The floral notes are what fade after a few hours and then vanilla is the main note you will smell throughout the rest of the day.  You can tell by the complexity of the scent and how long it lasts that this is really good quality. I also love that it is vegan.

reviews.review_text: I love Carolina Herrera‚Äôs original fragrance, so I was super excited to try her new fragrance, Blush, in an Elixir format for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review! This elixir is definitely more sensual and intense compared to her most popular Good Girl scent. The sweet notes of Bergamot and Mandarin Orange really shine through when you first spray it, but it quickly develops into a powdery, floral Rose scent. As it settles it starts to reveal a bit of Vanilla undertones, but not in a sweet way. To me, it definitely gives more of a mature, warm, floral scent. It‚Äôs a very wearable perfume for any age group. My daughter who is in her 20‚Äôs has been stealing it, and my mother who is in her 60‚Äôs also quite enjoys it! I‚Äôve been wearing it to work most days, and while I do find it to be a stronger fragrance, the scent does fade a bit throughout the day. I can definitely still smell it at the end of my work day so you can expect it to last at least 7 hours! Also, the iconic Caroline Herrera perfume bottles are gorgeous! The packaging certainly accentuates the luxuriousness of this perfume experience. The high heel stiletto bottle fades into a light, soft pink colour that fits with the name of this perfume perfectly. It is a bit on the pricier side coming in at 130$ Canadian for a 30ml bottle, but it is so worth it! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: A creamy floral fragrance for a night out!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free bottle of this to review, and I am so happy I did! The bottle is absolutely adorable and the perfume smells amazing. It is a creamy floral scent that is a little bit sweet, but not overly so. While I immediately pick up on the vanilla, it is more of a creamy vanilla scent. As I am usually not into sweet scents, I am pleasantly surprised that the sweetness isn‚Äôt overwhelming and it just adds a rich creaminess to the otherwise mainly floral composition of the fragrance. While it is described as having orange mandarin notes in it, too, my nose is not quite able to pick that out - I‚Äôm just getting a floral and creamy fragrance that has some depth to it.  Since this is a flanker of Good Girl Blush, I‚Äôm gonna draw some comparisons for those of you that are curious about how the Elixir differs. When looking at the notes, the main difference is that the peony has been swapped with rose, and tonka bean with patchouli. Personally, I have a hard time picking out the specific notes, though, and actually feel like the original blush might have more of a rosey smell than Elixir to my nose. I feel like the Elixir version is creamier, so maybe the vanilla is amped up a little but it also smells ‚Äúdeeper‚Äù, in a sense, and I think that may come from the patchouli. I feel like the original Blush is fresher in almost a ‚Äúsoapy‚Äù way to me, and maybe a bit powdery, too. That being said, once they dry down on the skin it gets harder to pick out the differences.  While Blush is an excellent summer and day-time scent, I feel like the Elixir is like a darker, night-time version of Blush - good for a night out or for cold weather months. I would say that Blush Elixir is slightly more complex and has more depth, while Blush is more simple and fresh. The longevity of the Blush Elixir is also amazing on me. I get 10+ hours of wear on skin alone, and even longer on clothes. The perfume also atomizes out of the bottle in a beautiful mist, so overall I am very impressed!

I had previously owned the original Good Girl Blush, and loved it! This one has the staples of the original, with a more intense and longer lasting performance. The value is more than worth the quality of the product, and you only need ONE spray! So it stretches so much farther than any other perfume I‚Äôve tried. The scent lasts on my skin all day long! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm going to start off with the bottle of this fragrance. There is nothing cute about it. This is a stunning bottle in the shape of a stiletto heel and it is absolutely sexy.   When comparing other fragrance bottles, it‚Äôs sometimes hard for me to tell what brand they are, as some fragrances come in a simple bottle, nothing unique that stands out.  Good Girl Blush Elixir stands out from other fragrances, the shape of the bottle is unique, it looks stunning on a vanity and it definitely is eye catching.  I like that there is no cap to this bottle, simply press down from the top and you will get a generous dose of the fragrance.   I checked up on the notes of this fragrance and the top notes are bergamot & mandarin orange. Middle notes are ylang ylang & rose and base notes are vanilla & patchouli.   When I smelled this fragrance for the first time, I noticed that it was very floral yet citrusy at the same time which made for a good combination.   As it dries down, it becomes powdery and I was able to get a whiff of that rose scent. Did not pick up on any vanilla. There was another scent that I picked up on but couldn‚Äôt pinpoint what it was. Almost like a earthy scent which I believe it to be the patchouli note but I can‚Äôt too be sure as I‚Äôm not really that familiar with the scent of patchouli.  As for the projection of this fragrance, it lasts long. I sprayed this early morning and was still able to smell the fragrance even several hours later.  This is a perfect fragrance to wear during the evening, but can be worn during the day as well since it‚Äôs light.   It‚Äôs a really nice blend of floral & citrus which I find would be perfect to wear in any time of the day.

The bottle is gorgeous and the way that you spray is super interesting! It would be a very nice gift or something gorgeous to display after use. The smell is sweet, a little too sweet for my taste but as it dries off it is a little bit less sweet.
